attributes.action: call a General Election following the lost of trust in our current MP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the loss of trust in the House of Commons following the revelations of expenses that have been claimed. The People of the UK should have the opportunity to decide if our current elected MP's  should face the ballot box sooner rather than later.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
